00107 static inline
00108 CSL_Status USB_swapWords (Uint16 *dataBuffer,
00109                           Uint32 dataLength)
00110 {
00111     CSL_Status    status;
00112     Uint32        looper;
00113     Uint16        tempData;
00114 
00115     status = CSL_SOK;
00116 
00117     /* Check the input parameters */
00118     if ((dataBuffer != NULL) && (dataLength > 0))
00119     {
00120         /* Swap the words in the given buffer */
00121         for (looper = 0; looper < dataLength/2; looper++)
00122         {
00123             tempData = *dataBuffer++;
00124             *(dataBuffer -1) = *dataBuffer;
00125             *dataBuffer++ = tempData;
00126         }
00127     }
00128     else
00129     {
00130         status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
00131     }
00132 
00133     return (status);
00134 }

00167 static inline
00168 void USB_initDma(void)
00169 {
00170     Bool  value;
00171 
00172     // save the
00173     // disable the hardware interrupt to make sure the
00174     // following operations are atomic
00175     value = IRQ_globalDisable();
00176 
00177     /* set TX channel 0 for EP1, queue manger 0 and TX completion queue number 24 */
00178     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[0].TXGCR1 = 0x0018;
00179     /* enable TX channel 0 for EP1, enable */
00180     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[0].TXGCR2 = CSL_USB_TXGCR2_TX_ENABLE_MASK;
00181 
00182     /* set TX channel 1 for EP2, queue manger 0 and TX completion queue number 24 */
00183     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[1].TXGCR1 = 0x0018;
00184     /* enable TX channel 1 for EP2, enable */
00185     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[1].TXGCR2 = CSL_USB_TXGCR2_TX_ENABLE_MASK;
00186 
00187     /* set TX channel 2 for EP3, queue manger 0 and TX completion queue number 24 */
00188     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[2].TXGCR1 = 0x0018;
00189     /* enable TX channel 2 for EP3, enable */
00190     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[2].TXGCR2 = CSL_USB_TXGCR2_TX_ENABLE_MASK;
00191 
00192     /* set TX channel 3 for EP4, queue manger 0 and TX completion queue number 24 */
00193     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[3].TXGCR1 = 0x0018;
00194     /* enable TX channel 3 for EP4, enable */
00195     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[3].TXGCR2 = CSL_USB_TXGCR2_TX_ENABLE_MASK;
00196 
00197     /* set RX channel 0 for EP1,  queue manager number 0, RX completion queue number 26
00198      * set descriptor type to Host (value 1) [15:14]
00199      */
00200     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[0].RXGCR1 = CSL_USB_RXGCR1_DEFVAL;
00201     /* enable RX channel 0. Channel 0 is for EP1
00202      * set Starvation error result in dropping packet [24]
00203      * set SOF offset 0 [23:16]
00204      */
00205     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[0].RXGCR2 = CSL_USB_RXGCR2_DEFVAL;
00206     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[0].RXHPCR1A = CSL_USB_RXHPCR1A_RESETVAL;
00207     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[0].RXHPCR2A = CSL_USB_RXHPCR2A_RESETVAL;
00208     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[0].RXHPCR1B = CSL_USB_RXHPCR1B_RESETVAL;
00209     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[0].RXHPCR2B = CSL_USB_RXHPCR2B_RESETVAL;
00210 
00211     /* set RX channel 1 for EP2,  queue manager number 0, RX completion queue number 26
00212      * set descriptor type to Host (value 1) [15:14]
00213      */
00214     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[1].RXGCR1 = CSL_USB_RXGCR1_DEFVAL;
00215 
00216     /* enable RX channel 1. Channel 1 is for EP2
00217      * set Starvation error result in dropping packet [24]
00218      * set SOF offset 0 [23:16]
00219      */
00220     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[1].RXGCR2 = CSL_USB_RXGCR2_DEFVAL;
00221 
00222     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[1].RXHPCR1A = CSL_USB_RXHPCR1A_RESETVAL;
00223     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[1].RXHPCR2A = CSL_USB_RXHPCR2A_RESETVAL;
00224     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[1].RXHPCR1B = CSL_USB_RXHPCR1B_RESETVAL;
00225     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[1].RXHPCR2B = CSL_USB_RXHPCR2B_RESETVAL;
00226 
00227     /* set RX channel 2 for EP3,  queue manager number 0, RX completion queue number 26
00228      * set descriptor type to Host (value 1) [15:14]
00229      */
00230     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[2].RXGCR1 = CSL_USB_RXGCR1_DEFVAL;
00231     /* enable RX channel 2. Channel 2 is for EP3
00232      * set Starvation error result in dropping packet [24]
00233      * set SOF offset 0 [23:16]
00234      */
00235     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[2].RXGCR2 = CSL_USB_RXGCR2_DEFVAL;
00236     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[2].RXHPCR1A = CSL_USB_RXHPCR1A_RESETVAL;
00237     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[2].RXHPCR2A = CSL_USB_RXHPCR2A_RESETVAL;
00238     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[2].RXHPCR1B = CSL_USB_RXHPCR1B_RESETVAL;
00239     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[2].RXHPCR2B = CSL_USB_RXHPCR2B_RESETVAL;
00240 
00241     /* set RX channel 3 for EP4,  queue manager number 0, RX completion queue number 26
00242      * set descriptor type to Host (value 1) [15:14]
00243      */
00244     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[3].RXGCR1 = CSL_USB_RXGCR1_DEFVAL;
00245     /* enable RX channel 3. Channel 3 is for EP4
00246      * set Starvation error result in dropping packet [24]
00247      * set SOF offset 0 [23:16]
00248      */
00249     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[3].RXGCR2 = CSL_USB_RXGCR2_DEFVAL;
00250     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[3].RXHPCR1A = CSL_USB_RXHPCR1A_RESETVAL;
00251     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[3].RXHPCR2A = CSL_USB_RXHPCR2A_RESETVAL;
00252     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[3].RXHPCR1B = CSL_USB_RXHPCR1B_RESETVAL;
00253     usbRegisters->CHANNEL[3].RXHPCR2B = CSL_USB_RXHPCR2B_RESETVAL;
00254 
00255     /* Related to Scheduler Initialization */
00256     /* setup Channel 0 (EP1) for RX and TX */
00257     usbRegisters->CDMASCHETBLWORD[0].ENTRYLSW = 0x0080;
00258     /* setup Channel 1 (EP2) for RX and TX */
00259     usbRegisters->CDMASCHETBLWORD[0].ENTRYMSW = 0x0181;
00260     /* setup Channel 2 (EP3) for RX and TX */
00261     usbRegisters->CDMASCHETBLWORD[1].ENTRYLSW = 0x0282;
00262     /* setup Channel 3 (EP4) for RX and TX */
00263     usbRegisters->CDMASCHETBLWORD[1].ENTRYMSW = 0x0383;
00264 
00265     /* setup 4 entries */
00266     usbRegisters->DMA_SCHED_CTRL1 = 7;
00267 
00268     /* enable scheduler */
00269     usbRegisters->DMA_SCHED_CTRL2 = CSL_USB_DMA_SCHED_CTRL2_ENABLE_MASK;
00270     /* Ends: Related to Scheduler Initialization */
00271 
00272     // enable the hardware interrupt
00273     IRQ_globalRestore(value);
00274 }

00313 static inline
00314 CSL_Status USB_initQueueManager(CSL_UsbHostPktDescr *hpdtx,
00315                                 Uint32              *pLinkingRam)
00316 {
00317     Uint32        u32Addr;
00318     Uint16        u16CpyReg;
00319     CSL_Status    status;
00320     Bool          value;
00321 
00322     status =  CSL_SOK;
00323 
00324     if((hpdtx != NULL) && (pLinkingRam != NULL))
00325     {
00326         /* setup linking RAM 0 base address */
00327         u32Addr   = (Uint32)pLinkingRam;
00328         u16CpyReg = (Uint16)((u32Addr * 2) & CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK);
00329 
00330         // disable the hardware interrupt to make sure the
00331         // following operations are atomic
00332         value = IRQ_globalDisable();
00333         usbRegisters->LRAM0BASE1 = u16CpyReg;
00334         u16CpyReg = (Uint16)(((u32Addr * 2) >> CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_SHIFT) &
00335                                                CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK);
00336         /* OR with 8 for SARAM */
00337         usbRegisters->LRAM0BASE2 = u16CpyReg | 8;
00338         /* setup linking RAM0 size */
00339         usbRegisters->LRAM0SIZE  = CSL_USB_LRAM0SIZE_DEFVAL;
00340 
00341         /* setup linking RAM 1 base address */
00342         u32Addr   = (Uint32)pLinkingRam;
00343         u16CpyReg = (Uint16)((u32Addr * 2) & CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK);
00344         usbRegisters->LRAM1BASE1 = (Uint16)u16CpyReg;
00345         u16CpyReg = (Uint16)(((u32Addr * 2) >> CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_SHIFT) &
00346                                                CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK);
00347         /* OR with 8 for SARAM */
00348         usbRegisters->LRAM1BASE2 = u16CpyReg | 8;
00349 
00350         /* setup memory region 0 base address */
00351         u32Addr = (Uint32)(hpdtx);
00352         u16CpyReg = (Uint16)((u32Addr * 2) & CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK);
00353         usbRegisters->QMMEMREGR[0].QMEMRBASE1 = u16CpyReg;
00354 
00355         /* OR with 8 for SARAM */
00356         u16CpyReg = (Uint16)( ((u32Addr * 2) >> CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_SHIFT) &
00357                                                 CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK);
00358         usbRegisters->QMMEMREGR[0].QMEMRBASE2 = u16CpyReg | 8;
00359 
00360         /* setup memory region control register 32 byte per descriptor and 32 descriptors  allowed */
00361         usbRegisters->QMMEMREGR[0].QMEMRCTRL1 = 0x0000;//CSL_USB_QMEMRCTRL1_DEFVAL;
00362         usbRegisters->QMMEMREGR[0].QMEMRCTRL2 = CSL_USB_QMEMRCTRL2_DEFVAL;
00363         // enable the hardware interrupt
00364         IRQ_globalRestore(value);
00365     }
00366     else
00367     {
00368         status =  CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
00369     }
00370 
00371     return(status);
00372 }

00406 static inline
00407 void USB_dmaPopQue(Uint16 queueNum)
00408 {
00409     Uint16 descTemp, countTemp;
00410 
00411     countTemp = usbRegisters->QMQNS[queueNum].QSTATA;
00412 
00413     while (countTemp > 0)
00414     {
00415         descTemp = usbRegisters->QMQN[queueNum].CTRL1D;
00416         countTemp = usbRegisters->QMQNS[queueNum].QSTATA;
00417 
00418         /* TO avoid compilation warnings */
00419         descTemp= descTemp;
00420         countTemp = countTemp;
00421     }
00422 }

00464 static inline
00465 void USB_dmaRxStart(DWORD dwEndpoint)
00466 {
00467     Uint16    saveIndex;
00468 
00469     /* save the index register value */
00470     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
00471 
00472     /* Write the endpoint configuration*/
00473     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE  &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
00474     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE  |= dwEndpoint;
00475 
00476 #if 0 ///MW It clears the wrong bit
00477     // clear AutoClear (bit 15) and DMAMode (bit 11)
00478     usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX &= 0x6FFF;
00479 #else
00480     // clear AutoClear (bit 15) and DMAMode (bit 11)
00481     usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX &= 0x77FF;
00482 #endif
00483 
00484 #if 0 ///MW, need set the DISNYET (bit 12) too
00485     /* Enable the USB DMA for Rx operation */
00486     usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX |= CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_DMAEN_MASK;
00487 #else
00488     /* Enable the USB DMA for Rx operation (bit 13) and set DSINYET (bit 12) */
00489     usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_DMAEN_MASK|CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_DISNYET_MASK);
00490 #endif
00491 
00492     /* restore the index register */
00493     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE   = saveIndex;
00494 }

00537 static inline
00538 CSL_Status USB_confDmaRx(CSL_UsbHostPktDescr *hpdrx,
00539                          Uint32              packetsize,
00540                          Uint16              *pRxBuffer)
00541 {
00542     volatile Uint16    index;
00543     CSL_Status         status;
00544     Bool               value;
00545 
00546     status = CSL_SOK;
00547 
00548     if((hpdrx != NULL) && (pRxBuffer != NULL))
00549     {
00550         /* Set packet info word 0 */
00551         hpdrx->PacketInfoWord0 = ((Uint32)HOST_PACKET_DESCR_TYPE << 27) | packetsize;
00552         /* set source port, channel, sub-channel to 0 */
00553         hpdrx->PacketInfoWord1 = 0;
00554 
00555         /* set USB packet, return policy to entire, off-chip memory,
00556          * return to Q manager 0 and Q 26
00557          */
00558         hpdrx->PacketInfoWord2 = ((Uint32)PACKET_TYPE_FOR_USB << 26);
00559         hpdrx->PacketInfoWord2 |= 26; /* Queue Number to be used for
00560                                           transmission */
00561 
00562         hpdrx->Buffer0InfoWord0 = packetsize;
00563 
00564         /* buffer pointer in SARAM */
00565         hpdrx->Buffer0InfoWord1 = ((Uint32)pRxBuffer) << 1 | 0x80000;
00566 
00567         /* next descriptor */
00568         hpdrx->LinkingWord = 0;
00569         hpdrx->OriginalBuffer0InfoWord0 = packetsize;
00570 
00571         /* buffer pointer in SARAM */
00572         hpdrx->OriginalBuffer0InfoWord1 = ((Uint32)pRxBuffer) << 1 | 0x80000;
00573 
00574         // disable the hardware interrupt to make sure the
00575         // following operations are atomic
00576         value = IRQ_globalDisable();
00577         usbRegisters->QMQN[0].CTRL1D = ((((Uint32)hpdrx) << 1) &
00578                                            CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK) | 2;
00579         usbRegisters->QMQN[0].CTRL2D = (((((Uint32)hpdrx) >> 15) &
00580                                            CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK) | 8);
00581         // enable the hardware interrupt
00582         IRQ_globalRestore(value);
00583     }
00584     else
00585     {
00586         status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
00587     }
00588 
00589     return(status);
00590 }
00591 
00592 
00638 static inline
00639 CSL_Status USB_confDmaTx(DWORD               dwEndpoint,                
00640                          CSL_UsbHostPktDescr *hpdtx,
00641                          Uint32              packetsize,
00642                          Uint16              *pTxBuffer,
00643                          Bool                swapWords)
00644 {
00645     CSL_Status    status;
00646     Bool          value;
00647 
00648     status = CSL_SOK;
00649 
00650     if((hpdtx != NULL) && (pTxBuffer != NULL))
00651     {
00652         /* Swap the words in the data buffer */
00653         if(TRUE == swapWords)
00654         {
00655             /* On VC5505 DSP, DMA will perform a word swap on the source buffer
00656                before transferring it to the destination. During USB Tx a word
00657                swap by software is required before DMA data transfer to ensure
00658                that the data is transferred to the destination in proper order.
00659                HW word swap by DMA will be compensated by the software word swap.
00660              */
00661             USB_swapWords (pTxBuffer, packetsize/2);
00662         }
00663 
00664         /* Set packet info word 0 */
00665         hpdtx->PacketInfoWord0 = ((Uint32)HOST_PACKET_DESCR_TYPE << 27) | packetsize;
00666         /* set source port, channel, sub-channel to 0 */
00668         /* set source port to EP1, channel, sub-channel to 0 */
00669         hpdtx->PacketInfoWord1 = 0;
00670 
00671         /* set USB packet, return policy to entire, off-chip memory,
00672          * return to Q manager 0 and Q 24
00673          */
00674         hpdtx->PacketInfoWord2 = ((Uint32)PACKET_TYPE_FOR_USB << 26);
00675         hpdtx->PacketInfoWord2 |= 24; /* Queue Number to be used for
00676                                           transmission */
00677 
00678         hpdtx->Buffer0InfoWord0 = packetsize;
00679 
00680         /* buffer pointer in SARAM */
00681         hpdtx->Buffer0InfoWord1 = ((Uint32)pTxBuffer) << 1 | 0x80000;
00682 
00683         /* next descriptor */
00684         hpdtx->LinkingWord = 0;
00685         hpdtx->OriginalBuffer0InfoWord0 = packetsize;
00686 
00687         /* buffer pointer in SARAM */
00688         hpdtx->OriginalBuffer0InfoWord1 = ((Uint32)pTxBuffer) << 1 | 0x80000;
00689 
00690         // disable the hardware interrupt to make sure the
00691         // following operations are atomic
00692         value = IRQ_globalDisable();
00693         /* add packet descriptor to TX submission queue for the Endpoint */
00694         /* EP1 to 16 or 17, EP2 to 18 or 19, EP3 to 20 or 21, EP4 to 22 or 23 */ 
00695         
00696         usbRegisters->QMQN[14+dwEndpoint*2].CTRL1D = ((((Uint32)hpdtx) << 1) &
00697                                               CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK) | 2;
00698         usbRegisters->QMQN[14+dwEndpoint*2].CTRL2D = (((((Uint32)hpdtx) >> 15) &
00699                                              CSL_USB_16BIT_REG_MASK) | 8);
00700 
00701         // enable the hardware interrupt
00702         IRQ_globalRestore(value);
00703     }
00704     else
00705     {
00706         status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
00707     }
00708 
00709     return(status);
00710 }
00711 
00757 static inline
00758 void USB_dmaRxStop(DWORD  dwEndpoint,
00759                    Uint16 *pRxBuffer,
00760                    Uint32 packetsize,
00761                    Bool   swapWords)
00762 {
00763     Uint16  saveIndex = 0;
00764 
00765     /* save the index register value */
00766     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
00767 
00768     /*Write the endpoint configuration*/
00769     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
00770     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= dwEndpoint;
00771 
00772     usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX &= ~CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_DMAEN_MASK;
00773 
00774     /* restore the index register */
00775     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
00776 
00777     if(swapWords == TRUE)
00778     {
00779         /* Swap the words in Rx buffer */
00780         /* On VC5505 DSP, DMA will perform a word swap on the source buffer
00781            before transferring it to the destination. During USB Rx a word swap
00782            by software is required after DMA data transfer to ensure that
00783            the data is received in proper order.HW word swap by DMA will
00784            be compensated by the software word swap.
00785          */
00786         USB_swapWords (pRxBuffer, packetsize/2);
00787     }
00788 }
00789 
00832 static inline
00833 void USB_dmaTxStart(DWORD dwEndpoint)
00834 {
00835     Uint16  saveIndex;
00836 
00837     /* save the index register value */
00838     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
00839 
00840     /* Write the endpoint configuration */
00841     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
00842     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= dwEndpoint;
00843 
00844     /* Flush the FIFO */
00845     CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX, USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO, TRUE);
00846 
00847     /* clear auticlear (bit 15) and set DMA mode (bit 11) */
00848     usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX &= 0x7FFF;
00849     usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= 0x1000;
00850 
00851     /* Enable the USB DMA */
00852     usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_DMAEN_MASK;
00853 
00854     /* restore the index register */
00855     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
00856 }
00857 
00858 
00898 static inline
00899 void USB_dmaTxStop(DWORD dwEndpoint)
00900 {
00901     Uint16    saveIndex;
00902 
00903     /* save the index register value */
00904     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
00905 
00906     /* Write the endpoint configuration */
00907     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
00908     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= dwEndpoint;
00909 
00910     /* Disable the USB DMA */
00911     usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX &= ~CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_DMAEN_MASK;
00912 
00913     /* restore the index register */
00914     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
00915 }
00916 
00982 static inline
00983 CSL_Status USB_handleTx(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev,
00984                         DWORD            dwEndpoint)
00985 {
00986     DWORD           cbToWrite;
00987     WORD            *pwBuffer;
00988     DWORD           cbBuffer;
00989     DWORD           cbWritten;
00990     Uint16          count;
00991     Uint16          saveIndex;
00992     CSL_Status      status;
00993     pUsbEpStatus    peps;
00994     pUsbTransfer    pTransfer;
00995     volatile ioport Uint16    *pFifoAddr;
00996     volatile        Uint32 delay;
00997 
00998     status    = CSL_SOK;
00999     count     = 0;
01000     saveIndex = 0;
01001     cbWritten =0;
01002 
01003     if(hUsbDev != NULL)
01004     {
01005         peps = &hUsbDev->pEpStatus[dwEndpoint];
01006         pTransfer = peps->pTransfer;
01007 
01008         if((pTransfer != NULL) && (pTransfer->fComplete == FALSE))
01009         {
01010             pwBuffer  = (WORD*)pTransfer->pvBuffer + pTransfer->cbTransferred/2;
01011             cbBuffer  = (pTransfer->cbBuffer - pTransfer->cbTransferred);
01012             pFifoAddr = (volatile ioport Uint16*)peps->pFifoAddr;
01013 
01014             /* Min of input byte count and supported size */
01015             cbToWrite = CSL_USB_MIN(cbBuffer, peps->dwPacketSizeAssigned);
01016 
01017             /* No need to transfer the data if this flag is set */
01018             if(pTransfer->ioFlags == CSL_USB_IOFLAG_NOT)
01019             {
01020                 pTransfer->fComplete = TRUE;
01021             }
01022             else
01023             {
01024                 if(peps->fStalled != TRUE)
01025                 {
01026                     /* Check if USB is configured for DMA */
01027                     if(((cbToWrite == 512) || (cbToWrite == 64)) &&
01028                        ((hUsbDev->opMode == CSL_USB_OPMODE_DMA) ||
01029                        (hUsbDev->opMode == CSL_USB_OPMODE_DMA_TXONLY)))
01030                     {
01031                         pTransfer->cbTransferred += cbToWrite;
01032                         pTransfer->prevTxferLen   = cbToWrite;
01033 
01034                         USB_dmaTxStart(dwEndpoint);
01035 
01036                         if (pTransfer->cbTransferred == pTransfer->cbBuffer)
01037                         {
01038                             pTransfer->fComplete = TRUE;
01039                         }
01040                         else
01041                         {
01042                             status = hUsbDev->completeTransferCallback(hUsbDev, peps);
01043                         }
01044                     }
01045                     else
01046                     {
01047 
01048 #if ((defined(CSL_MSC_TEST)) || (defined(CSL_AC_TEST)))
01049 
01050                         /* TI MSC put the DATA length as the first WORD,
01051                            bypass it */
01052                         if((cbToWrite != 512) && ((cbToWrite != 64)))
01053                         {
01054                             pwBuffer++;
01055                         }
01056 #endif
01057 
01058                         /* save the index register value */
01059                         saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
01060 
01061                         /* Select the end point for data transfer */
01062                         CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE,
01063                                  USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL,
01064                                  CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_RESETVAL);
01065 
01066                         CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE,
01067                                  USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL,
01068                                  dwEndpoint);
01069 
01070                         /* Flush the FIFO */
01071                         CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX,
01072                                  USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO, TRUE);
01073 
01074                         if(cbToWrite > 0)
01075                         {
01076                             /* write out all the bytes */
01077                             cbWritten = cbToWrite;
01078 
01079                             for(count = 0; count < (cbToWrite/2); count++)
01080                             {
01081                                 *pFifoAddr = *pwBuffer++;
01082                             }
01083 
01084                             if(cbToWrite % 2)
01085                             {
01086                                 /* Enable byte access */
01087                                 CSL_FINST(sysCtrlRegs->USBSCR,
01088                                           SYS_USBSCR_BYTEMODE, LOWER);
01089                                 CSL_FINS(*pFifoAddr, USB_FIFO1R1_DATA,
01090                                          *pwBuffer);
01091                                 /* Disable byte access */
01092                                 CSL_FINST(sysCtrlRegs->USBSCR,
01093                                           SYS_USBSCR_BYTEMODE, FULL);
01094                             }
01095                         }
01096 
01097                         if(peps->xferType == CSL_USB_ISO)
01098                         {
01099                             usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |=
01100                                             CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK;
01101                         }
01102 
01103                         /* Commit Tx Packet */
01104                         CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX,
01105                                  USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_RXPKTRDY, TRUE);
01106 
01107                         /* restore the index register */
01108                         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
01109 
01110                         /* Update the Transferred count */
01111                         pTransfer->cbTransferred += cbWritten;
01112                         pTransfer->prevTxferLen   = cbWritten;
01113 
01114                         if((pTransfer->cbTransferred == pTransfer->cbBuffer) ||
01115                            (cbWritten == 0))
01116                         {
01117                             pTransfer->fComplete = TRUE;
01118                         }
01119                     }
01120                 }
01121             }
01122 
01123             if (pTransfer->fComplete)
01124             {
01125                 hUsbDev->fWaitingOnFlagA = FALSE;
01126                 status = hUsbDev->completeTransferCallback(hUsbDev, peps);
01127             }
01128         }
01129         else
01130         {
01131             status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
01132         }
01133     }
01134     else
01135     {
01136         status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
01137     }
01138 
01139     return(status);
01140 }
01141 
01207 static inline
01208 CSL_Status USB_handleRx(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev,
01209                         DWORD            dwEndpoint)
01210 {
01211     DWORD               cbToRead;
01212     DWORD               cbBuffer;
01213     DWORD               dwBytesRead;
01214     WORD                *pwBuffer;
01215     pUsbTransfer        pTransfer;
01216     CSL_Status          status;
01217     Uint16              saveIndex;
01218     pUsbEpStatus        peps;
01219     volatile Uint16     count;
01220     volatile ioport Uint16    *pFifoAddr;
01221 
01222     status      = CSL_SOK;
01223     dwBytesRead = 0;
01224 
01225     if(hUsbDev != NULL)
01226     {
01227         peps = &hUsbDev->pEpStatus[dwEndpoint];
01228         pTransfer = peps->pTransfer;
01229 
01230         if((pTransfer != NULL) && (pTransfer->fComplete == FALSE))
01231         {
01232             cbBuffer = pTransfer->cbBuffer - pTransfer->cbTransferred;
01233             pwBuffer = (WORD*)pTransfer->pvBuffer + pTransfer->cbTransferred/2;
01234             pFifoAddr   = (volatile ioport Uint16*)peps->pFifoAddr;
01235 
01236             /* Min of input byte count and supported size */
01237             cbToRead = CSL_USB_MIN(cbBuffer, peps->dwPacketSizeAssigned);
01238 
01239             if(((cbToRead == 512) || (cbToRead == 64)) &&
01240                 (hUsbDev->opMode == CSL_USB_OPMODE_DMA))
01241             {
01242                 pTransfer->cbTransferred += cbToRead;
01243                 pTransfer->prevTxferLen   = cbToRead;
01244 
01245                 USB_dmaRxStart(dwEndpoint);
01246 
01247                 if (pTransfer->cbTransferred == pTransfer->cbBuffer)
01248                 {
01249                     pTransfer->fComplete = TRUE;
01250                     hUsbDev->fWaitingOnFlagB = FALSE;
01251                 }
01252 
01253                 status = hUsbDev->completeTransferCallback(hUsbDev, peps);
01254             }
01255             else
01256             {
01257 
01258 #if ((defined(CSL_MSC_TEST)) || (defined(CSL_AC_TEST)))
01259 
01260                 /* TI MSC put the DATA length as the first WORD, bypass it */
01261                 if((cbToRead != 512) && ((cbToRead != 64)))
01262                 {
01263                     pwBuffer++;
01264                 }
01265 #endif
01266 
01267                 if(cbToRead > 0)
01268                 {
01269                     /* Write out all the bytes */
01270                     dwBytesRead = cbToRead;
01271 
01272                     for(count = 0; count < (cbToRead/2); count++)
01273                     {
01274                         *pwBuffer++ = *pFifoAddr;
01275                     }
01276 
01277                     if(cbToRead % 2)
01278                     {
01279                         /* Enable byte access */
01280                         CSL_FINST(sysCtrlRegs->USBSCR,
01281                                   SYS_USBSCR_BYTEMODE, LOWER);
01282                         *pwBuffer = *pFifoAddr & 0xFF;
01283 
01284                         /* Disable byte access */
01285                         CSL_FINST(sysCtrlRegs->USBSCR,
01286                                   SYS_USBSCR_BYTEMODE, FULL);
01287                     }
01288                 }
01289 
01290                 pTransfer->cbTransferred += dwBytesRead;
01291                 pTransfer->prevTxferLen   = dwBytesRead;
01292 
01293                 if((pTransfer->cbTransferred == pTransfer->cbBuffer) ||
01294                    (dwBytesRead == 0))
01295                 {
01296                     pTransfer->fComplete = TRUE;
01297                 }
01298 
01299                 /* Save the index register value */
01300                 saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
01301 
01302                 CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE,
01303                          USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL,
01304                          CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_RESETVAL);
01305 
01306                 CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE,
01307                          USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL, dwEndpoint);
01308 
01309                 if(peps->xferType == CSL_USB_ISO)
01310                 {
01311                     /* Clear the data toggle bit */
01312                     usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
01313                 }
01314 
01315                 /* Clear the rxpktrdy bit */
01316                 CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX,
01317                          USB_PERI_RXCSR_RXPKTRDY, FALSE);
01318 
01319                 /* Restore the index register */
01320                 usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
01321 
01322                 if(pTransfer->fComplete == TRUE)
01323                 {
01324                     hUsbDev->fWaitingOnFlagB = FALSE;
01325 
01326                     /* This transfer is completed */
01327 #if ((defined(CSL_MSC_TEST)) || (defined(CSL_AC_TEST)))
01328                     /* TI MSC put the DATA length as the first WORD, bypass it */
01329                     if((cbToRead != 512) && (cbToRead != 64))
01330                     {
01331                         *(PWORD)pTransfer->pvBuffer = pTransfer->cbTransferred;
01332                     }
01333 #endif
01334 
01335                     status = hUsbDev->completeTransferCallback(hUsbDev, peps);
01336                 }
01337             }
01338         }
01339         else
01340         {
01341             status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
01342         }
01343     }
01344     else
01345     {
01346         status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
01347     }
01348 
01349     return(status);
01350 }
01351 
01396 static inline
01397 CSL_Status USB_processEP0Out(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev)
01398 {
01399     pUsbEpStatus    peps;
01400     pUsbTransfer    pTransfer;
01401     WORD            *pwBuffer;
01402     CSL_Status      status;
01403 
01404     status = CSL_SOK;
01405 
01406     if(hUsbDev != NULL)
01407     {
01408         peps = &hUsbDev->pEpStatus[CSL_USB_EP0];
01409         pTransfer = peps->pTransfer;
01410 
01411         if((pTransfer != NULL) && (pTransfer->fComplete == FALSE))
01412         {
01413             /* for none-last packet, it is always WORD align */
01414             pwBuffer = (WORD*)pTransfer->pvBuffer + pTransfer->cbTransferred/2;
01415 
01416 #if ((defined(CSL_MSC_TEST)) || (defined(CSL_AC_TEST)))
01417 
01418             /* TI MSC put the DATA length as the first WORD, bypass it */
01419             (WORD*)pwBuffer++;
01420 #endif
01421 
01422             /* move data from ep0 fifo to ep buffer */
01423             pTransfer->cbTransferred = CSL_USB_MIN(hUsbDev->cbOutEP0Buf,
01424                                                    pTransfer->cbBuffer);
01425 
01426             memcpy(pwBuffer, (PVOID)hUsbDev->dwOutEP0Buf,
01427                    (pTransfer->cbTransferred+1)/2);
01428 
01429             hUsbDev->fOutPhaseCmd  = FALSE;
01430             pTransfer->fComplete    = TRUE;
01431             pTransfer->prevTxferLen = pTransfer->cbTransferred;
01432 
01433 #if ((defined(CSL_MSC_TEST)) || (defined(CSL_AC_TEST)))
01434             /* This transfer is completed */
01435             *(PWORD)pTransfer->pvBuffer = pTransfer->cbTransferred;
01436 #endif
01437             status = hUsbDev->completeTransferCallback(hUsbDev, peps);
01438         }
01439         else
01440         {
01441             status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
01442         }
01443     }
01444     else
01445     {
01446         status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
01447     }
01448     return(status);
01449 }
01450 
01495 #if 1
01496 static inline
01497 CSL_Status USB_processEP0In(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev)
01498 {
01499     pUsbEpStatus    peps;
01500     pUsbTransfer    pTransfer;
01501     CSL_Status      status;
01502     PWORD           pwBuffer;
01503     DWORD           cbBuffer;
01504     WORD            cbToWrite;
01505     Uint16          count;
01506     Uint16          flag;
01507     Uint16          saveIndex;
01508 
01509     flag   = 0;
01510     status = CSL_SOK;
01511 
01512     if(hUsbDev != NULL)
01513     {
01514         peps = &hUsbDev->pEpStatus[CSL_USB_EP0];
01515         pTransfer = peps->pTransfer;
01516 
01517         if((pTransfer != NULL) && (pTransfer->fComplete == FALSE))
01518         {
01519             /* for none-last packet, it is always WORD align */
01520             pwBuffer = (PWORD)pTransfer->pvBuffer + pTransfer->cbTransferred/2;
01521             cbBuffer = pTransfer->cbBuffer - pTransfer->cbTransferred;
01522 
01523 #if ((defined(CSL_MSC_TEST)) || (defined(CSL_AC_TEST)))
01524             /* TI MSC put the DATA length as the first WORD, bypass it */
01525             pwBuffer++;
01526 #endif
01527 
01528             /* Min of input byte count and supported size */
01529             cbToWrite = CSL_USB_MIN(cbBuffer, peps->dwPacketSizeAssigned);
01530 
01531             while(TRUE)
01532             {
01533                 /* write data to EP0 FIFO */
01534                 for(count = 0; count < cbToWrite/2;count++)
01535                 {
01536                     usbRegisters->FIFO0R1 = (*pwBuffer);
01537                     pwBuffer++;
01538                 }
01539 
01540                 if(cbToWrite % 2 == TRUE)
01541                 {
01542                     /* Enable byte access */
01543                     CSL_FINST(sysCtrlRegs->USBSCR, SYS_USBSCR_BYTEMODE, LOWER);
01544                     usbRegisters->FIFO0R1 = (*pwBuffer);
01545                     /* Disable byte access */
01546                     CSL_FINST(sysCtrlRegs->USBSCR, SYS_USBSCR_BYTEMODE, FULL);
01547                 }
01548 
01549                 /* update the remainder data length, we may need zero length */
01550                 if(cbToWrite <= CSL_USB_MAX_EP0_FIFO_LEN)
01551                 {
01552                     break;
01553                 }
01554                 else
01555                 {
01556                     cbToWrite -= CSL_USB_MAX_EP0_FIFO_LEN;
01557                 }
01558             }
01559 
01560             hUsbDev->fEP0BUFAvailable = FALSE;
01561 
01562             pTransfer->cbTransferred += cbToWrite;
01563             pTransfer->prevTxferLen   = cbToWrite;
01564             if(pTransfer->cbTransferred == pTransfer->cbBuffer)
01565             {
01566                 pTransfer->fComplete  = TRUE;
01567             }
01568 
01569             /* save the index register value */
01570             saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
01571 
01572             /* Reset Index register end point selection field */
01573             CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE,
01574                      USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL,
01575                      CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_RESETVAL);
01576 
01577             /* Select Ep 0 */
01578             CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE,
01579                      USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL,
01580                      CSL_USB_EP0);
01581 
01582             if(pTransfer->fComplete  == TRUE)
01583             {
01584                 hUsbDev->fWaitingOnEP0BUFAvail = FALSE;
01585 
01586                 /* set txpktrdy and data end */
01587                 flag = (CSL_USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_DATAEND_MASK |
01588                         CSL_USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_TXPKTRDY_MASK);
01589                 /* change ep0 state to EP0_IDLE */
01590                 hUsbDev->ep0State = CSL_USB_EP0_IDLE;
01591                 /* Commit Tx packet */
01592                 usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= flag;
01593 
01594                 status = hUsbDev->completeTransferCallback(hUsbDev, peps);
01595             }
01596             else
01597             {
01598                 /* set txpktrdy */
01599                 flag = CSL_USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_TXPKTRDY_MASK;
01600 
01601                 /* Commit Tx packet */
01602                 usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= flag;
01603             }
01604 
01605             /* restore the index register */
01606             usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
01607         }
01608         else
01609         {
01610             status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
01611         }
01612     }
01613     else
01614     {
01615         status = CSL_ESYS_INVPARAMS;
01616     }
01617 
01618     return(status);
01619 }
01620 #endif
01621 
01667 static inline
01668 void USB_handleRxIntr(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev)
01669 {
01670     Uint16          saveIndex;
01671     pUsbEpStatus    peps;
01672 
01673     peps = &hUsbDev->pEpStatus[CSL_USB_EP2];
01674     saveIndex = 0;
01675 
01676     /* save the index register value */
01677     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
01678 
01679     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
01680     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= CSL_USB_EP2;
01681 
01682     /* Check if sendstall bit is set */
01683     if((usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX & CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_INDX_SENDSTALL_MASK)
01684        == CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_INDX_SENDSTALL_MASK)
01685     {
01686         CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX, USB_PERI_TXCSR_SENDSTALL, FALSE);
01687     }
01688 
01689     /* check if RxPktRdy bit is set */
01690     if((usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX & CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_RXPKTRDY_MASK)
01691        == CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_RXPKTRDY_MASK)
01692     {
01693         if(peps->xferType == CSL_USB_ISO)
01694         {
01695             hUsbDev->fSetupPktCmd = TRUE;
01696         }
01697         else
01698         {
01699             hUsbDev->fWaitingOnFlagB = TRUE;
01700         }
01701     }
01702 
01703     /* restore the index register */
01704     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
01705 }
01706 
01749 static inline
01750 void USB_handleTxIntr(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev)
01751 {
01752     Uint16          saveIndex;
01753 
01754     saveIndex = 0;
01755 
01756     /* Save the index register value */
01757     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
01758 
01759     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
01761     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= CSL_USB_EP2;
01762 
01763     /* Check if sendstall bit is set */
01764     if((usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX & CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_INDX_SENDSTALL_MASK)
01765        == CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_INDX_SENDSTALL_MASK)
01766     {
01767         CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX, USB_PERI_TXCSR_SENDSTALL, FALSE);
01768     }
01769 
01770     /* Restore the index register */
01771     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
01772 }
01773 
01819 static inline
01820 Bool USB_checkSpeed(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev,
01821                     CSL_UsbBusSpeed  *pBusSpeed)
01822 {
01823     Uint16    wPower;
01824 
01825     wPower = usbRegisters->FADDR_POWER;
01826 
01827     if((wPower == 0) || (pBusSpeed == NULL))
01828     {
01829         return (FALSE);
01830     }
01831 
01832     /*
01833      * Highspeed mode bit of the power register will be set if the USB
01834      * successfully negotiates with host for operating in highspeed mode
01835      */
01836     if((usbRegisters->FADDR_POWER & CSL_USB_FADDR_POWER_HSMODE_MASK) != 0)
01837     {
01838         *pBusSpeed = CSL_USB_BS_HIGH_SPEED;
01839     }
01840     else
01841     {
01842         *pBusSpeed = CSL_USB_BS_FULL_SPEED;
01843     }
01844 
01845     return (TRUE);
01846 }
01847 
01893 static inline
01894 CSL_Status USB_readEP0Buf(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev,
01895                           DWORD            *pBuf)
01896 {
01897     WORD    packetSize;
01898     Uint16  saveIndex;
01899     WORD    count = 0;
01900     Uint32  tempStore;
01901     Uint16  flag;
01902 
01903     saveIndex  = 0;
01904     packetSize = 0;
01905     flag       = 0;
01906 
01907     /* save the index register value */
01908     saveIndex = (usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &
01909                  CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK);
01910 
01911     /* select EP0 registers */
01912     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~(CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK);
01913     /* get RX packet size */
01914     packetSize = ((usbRegisters->COUNT0_INDX) &
01915                   CSL_USB_COUNT0_INDX_EP0RXCOUNT_MASK);
01916 
01917     if((packetSize > CSL_USB_MAX_EP0_FIFO_LEN) ||
01918        (packetSize > hUsbDev->cbOutEP0DataReceived))
01919     {
01920         /* restore the index register */
01921         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~(CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK);
01922         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= saveIndex;
01923 
01924         flag = CSL_USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_SERV_RXPKTRDY_MASK;
01925         usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= flag;
01926 
01927         return (CSL_ESYS_FAIL);
01928     }
01929 
01930     pBuf = hUsbDev->dwOutEP0Buf;
01931 
01932     for(count = 0; count < packetSize; count += 4)
01933     {
01934         *pBuf = 0;
01935         tempStore = 0;
01936         *pBuf = usbRegisters->FIFO0R1;
01937         tempStore = usbRegisters->FIFO0R1;
01938         *pBuf |= (tempStore << 16);
01939         pBuf++;
01940     }
01941 
01942     hUsbDev->cbOutEP0DataReceived -= packetSize;
01943 
01944     if(hUsbDev->cbOutEP0DataReceived == 0)
01945     {
01946         /* set DataEnd bit */
01947         flag = CSL_USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_DATAEND_MASK;
01948     }
01949 
01950     /* set the ServicedRxPktRdy bit */
01951     flag |= CSL_USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_SERV_RXPKTRDY_MASK;
01952     usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= flag;
01953 
01954     /* restore the index register */
01955     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~(CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK);
01956     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= saveIndex;
01957 
01958     return (CSL_SOK);
01959 }
01960 
02002 static inline
02003 void USB_setConfiguration(CSL_UsbDevHandle hUsbDev,
02004                           Uint16           confVal)
02005 {
02006     Uint16 saveIndex;
02007     Uint16  tempVal;
02008 
02009     saveIndex = 0;
02010 
02011     if(hUsbDev->devNum == CSL_USB0)
02012     {
02013         /* save the index register value */
02014         saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
02015 
02016         /* Configure EP1 for Tx and Rx */
02017         /* Select EP1 */
02018         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
02019         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= CSL_USB_EP1;
02020 
02021         /* set ClrDataTog bit (TxCSR.D6) */
02022         usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
02023         /* set ClrDataTog bit (RxCSR.D7) */
02024         usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
02025 
02026         /* Flush FIFO if not empty */
02027         if((usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX & CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FIFONOTEMPTY_MASK) ==
02028            CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FIFONOTEMPTY_MASK)
02029         {
02030             //usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02031 
02032             tempVal = usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX;
02033 
02034             tempVal |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02035             tempVal &= ~(0x03);
02036 
02037             usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX = tempVal;
02038         }
02039 
02040         /* Configure EP2 for Tx and Rx */
02041         /* Select EP2 */
02042         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
02043         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= CSL_USB_EP2;
02044 
02045         /* set ClrDataTog bit (TxCSR.D6) */
02046         usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
02047         /* set ClrDataTog bit (RxCSR.D7) */
02048         usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
02049 
02050         /* Flush FIFO if not empty */
02051         if((usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX & CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FIFONOTEMPTY_MASK) ==
02052            CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FIFONOTEMPTY_MASK)
02053         {
02054             //usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02055 
02056             tempVal = usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX;
02057 
02058             tempVal |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02059             tempVal &= ~(0x03);
02060 
02061             usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX = tempVal;
02062         }
02063 
02064         /* Configure EP3 for Tx and Rx */
02065         /* Select EP3 */
02066         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
02067         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= CSL_USB_EP3;
02068 
02069         /* set ClrDataTog bit (TxCSR.D6) */
02070         usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
02071         /* set ClrDataTog bit (RxCSR.D7) */
02072         usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
02073 
02074         /* Flush FIFO if not empty */
02075         if((usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX & CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FIFONOTEMPTY_MASK) ==
02076            CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FIFONOTEMPTY_MASK)
02077         {
02078             //usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02079 
02080             tempVal = usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX;
02081 
02082             tempVal |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02083             tempVal &= ~(0x03);
02084 
02085             usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX = tempVal;
02086         }
02087 
02088         /* Configure EP4 for Tx and Rx */
02089         /* Select EP4 */
02090         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
02091         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= CSL_USB_EP4;
02092 
02093         /* set ClrDataTog bit (TxCSR.D6) */
02094         usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
02095         /* set ClrDataTog bit (RxCSR.D7) */
02096         usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX |= (CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_CLRDATATOG_MASK);
02097 
02098         /* Flush FIFO if not empty */
02099         if((usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX & CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FIFONOTEMPTY_MASK) ==
02100            CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FIFONOTEMPTY_MASK)
02101         {
02102             //usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02103 
02104             tempVal = usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX;
02105 
02106             tempVal |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02107             tempVal &= ~(0x03);
02108 
02109             usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX = tempVal;
02110         }
02111 
02112         /* restore the index register */
02113         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
02114     }
02115 }
02116 
02163 static inline
02164 Bool USB_isValidDataInFifoOut(pUsbEpStatus peps)
02165 {
02166     Uint16    saveIndex;
02167     Uint16    wByteCount;
02168     Uint16    flag;
02169 
02170     saveIndex  = 0;
02171     wByteCount = 0;
02172     flag       = FALSE;
02173 
02174     if((CSL_USB_EP1 == peps->dwEndpoint) ||
02175        (CSL_USB_EP2 == peps->dwEndpoint) ||
02176        (CSL_USB_EP3 == peps->dwEndpoint) ||
02177        (CSL_USB_EP4 == peps->dwEndpoint))
02178     {
02179         /* save the index register value */
02180         saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
02181 
02182         usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
02183             usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= peps->dwEndpoint;
02184 
02185         /* check if RxPktRdy is set */
02186         if((usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX & CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_RXPKTRDY_MASK) ==
02187             CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_RXPKTRDY_MASK)
02188         {
02189             wByteCount = usbRegisters->COUNT0_INDX & 0x1FFF;
02190             peps->dataReadFromFifo = wByteCount;
02191 
02192             if(peps->xferType != CSL_USB_ISO)
02193             {
02194             if((wByteCount <= peps->dwPacketSizeAssigned))
02195             {
02196                 /* packet is valid only if RxPktRdy is TRUE and
02197                   Bytes in FIFO is <= max pkt size assigned for the EP */
02198                 flag = TRUE;
02199             }
02200         }
02201             else
02202             {
02203                 flag = TRUE;
02204             }
02205         }
02206 
02207         /* restore the index register */
02208        usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
02209     }
02210 
02211     return(flag);
02212 }
02213 
02248 static inline
02249 void USB_flushFifo(DWORD dwEndpoint,
02250                    Bool  fifoDirFlag)
02251 {
02252     Uint16 saveIndex;
02253     Uint16 tempVal;
02254 
02255     saveIndex = 0;
02256 
02257     /* save the index register value */
02258     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
02259 
02260     /* Select end point */
02261     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
02262     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= dwEndpoint;
02263 
02264     if (dwEndpoint == CSL_USB_EP0)
02265     {
02266         /* Flush EP0 FIFO */
02267         usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= CSL_USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02268     }
02269     else
02270     {
02271         if (1 == fifoDirFlag)
02272         {
02273             /* Flush Tx FIFO of given end point */
02274             //usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02275             tempVal = usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX;
02276 
02277             tempVal |= CSL_USB_PERI_TXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02278             tempVal &= ~(0x03);
02279 
02280             usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX = tempVal;
02281         }
02282         else
02283         {
02284             /* Flush Rx FIFO of given end point */
02285             usbRegisters->PERI_RXCSR_INDX |=CSL_USB_PERI_RXCSR_FLUSHFIFO_MASK;
02286         }
02287     }
02288 
02289     /* Restore the index register */
02290     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
02291 }
02292 
02324 static inline
02325 void USB_serviceEp0RxPkt(Uint16 periCsr0Val)
02326 {
02327     usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX |= periCsr0Val;
02328 }

02337 static inline
02338 void USB_sendEpZLP(DWORD dwEndpoint)
02339 {
02340     Uint16 saveIndex;
02341 
02342     /* save the index register value */
02343     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
02344 
02345     /* Select end point */
02346     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
02347     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= dwEndpoint;
02348 
02349     // send zero length packet
02350     CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX,
02351              USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_TXPKTRDY, TRUE);
02352     CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX,
02353              USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_DATAEND, TRUE);
02354 
02355     /* Restore the index register */
02356     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
02357 }
02358 
02366 static inline
02367 void USB_clearEpRxPktRdy(DWORD dwEndpoint)
02368 {
02369     Uint16 saveIndex;
02370 
02371     /* save the index register value */
02372     saveIndex = usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE;
02373 
02374     /* Select end point */
02375     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE &= ~CSL_USB_INDEX_TESTMODE_EPSEL_MASK;
02376     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE |= dwEndpoint;
02377 
02378     // send zero length packet
02379     CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX,
02380              USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_SERV_RXPKTRDY, TRUE);
02381     CSL_FINS(usbRegisters->PERI_CSR0_INDX,
02382              USB_PERI_CSR0_INDX_DATAEND, TRUE);
02383 
02384     /* Restore the index register */
02385     usbRegisters->INDEX_TESTMODE = saveIndex;
02386 }
